title: Bobby Reveals He Gives his Dog Sedatives When He's Going Crazy +  Lunchbox Has A New Christmas Business Idea + What Bobby Watched That Made Him Cry
itunes:title: Bobby Reveals He Gives his Dog Sedatives When He's Going Crazy +  Lunchbox Has A New Christmas Business Idea + What Bobby Watched That Made Him Cry
description:
Bobby asks the show what they think about him giving his dog sedatives to get him to chill out. Lunchbox went out to a local Christmas tree farm to pick up a tree for his family. He was so astonished to find out the Christmas trees cost over $75 for just a small one. After realizing how much money Christmas and Christmas trees are, Lunchbox came in with a brilliant idea… Bobby reveals what he watched over the weekend that made him cry (which apparently he’s doing a lot lately). We play ‘Name That Christmas Movie’

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
